item.description:
TC: Russ ltn56@juno.com or 978 562-4659

EVENT: Join the group for some paddlin' time on the Charles River. Meet Sat Sept 20 at 11am at the Charles River Canoe and Kayak Center 1171 Soldier's Field Rd at Artesani Park under the green-roofed kiosk. Parking is free. Look at their website for bus info and location directions.
We will anticipate a one hr trip unless we're blown out to sea. When we get our land legs back, those who wish may join us at Border's cafe in Harv Sq. for a Cajun or Mexican lunch,
RSVP: By Sept 17th for any details and so I can make arrangements with the boating center, rain cancels.
MEET: 11:00 AM at the kisok
COST: Hourly rates are $15 canoe, $14 single kayak and $16 for a double, plus $5 for nonmembers.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: KAYAKING ALONG THE CHARLES
